metadata.titel_preek: Seeing Clearly, Loving Dearly, Following Nearly

kernfrasen: Moved him into a new life
The man born blind is a witness
Trial conducted by the local elite
Old world is in free fall

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The old world is in free fall.

cognitieve_implicaties: The hearer feels a sense of urgency and instability.
theologische_implicaties: Human systems are temporary and prone to collapse without God.
ethische_implicaties: Do not cling to failing systems; look for a new foundation.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Fear or nihilism if the 'new' structure isn't immediately visible.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: Re-activates the physical sensation of vertigo to describe social change.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The preacher successfully links the juridical 'witness' theme with the visual 'sight' theme by framing sight as the evidence required for the trial.

incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: God is described as an unmanageable 'surge', yet Jesus is a 'point person' (a corporate/bureaucratic term).
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: Surges are chaotic; point persons are organizational and functional.

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The 'Clearly, Dearly, Nearly' rhyme bridges the gap between cognitive perception (seeing) and physical discipleship (following).

sterktes.beschrijving: Revitalizes the 'blindness' metaphor by framing it as 'nurtured not to see' (social conditioning).
sterktes.voorbeeld: It is all about... being nurtured not to see.

risicos.beschrijving: By framing blindness as being 'nurtured' or 'unable', it may reduce the moral weight of the 'authorities' sin.
risicos.voorbeeld: being unable to see, or being nurtured not to see
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view their own biases as passive conditions rather than active choices.

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; it forces the ancient text into the hearer's current economic reality.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: God is described as a 'strange surge' that 'scrambles old categories'.

verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: Faith as Trust/Submission to the Inexplicable.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Fits well with a Lenten or 'Healing' service focused on transformation.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by the JURIDICAL and ARCHITECTURAL domains. It uses the trial of the blind man to deconstruct the 'structures' of modern life (race, class, market). The primary cognitive move is from 'seeing' (perception) to 'following' (pathway).

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the source domain by describing the physical sensation of 'mud' or the 'scent' of the Siloam pool.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The gritty, cooling weight of the mud on the eyelids.

coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Stick to the 'Surge' (Force) metaphor to maintain the theme of 'unmanageable' power.

entailment_checks.metafoor: THE WORLD IS IN FREE FALL
entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: If everything is falling, there is no ground to stand on to help others.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Introduce the 'Rock' or 'Foundation' metaphor earlier to provide a landing spot.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to bridge ancient narrative with contemporary systemic critique.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: Focuses on the cognitive mapping of 'management' vs 'surge' rather than just the alliteration of 'Clearly, Dearly, Nearly'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Analyzes the conceptual domains rather than just the learning styles (Concrete Experience vs Abstract Conceptualization).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: Reveals how the preacher uses the 'Container' schema (managed truth) to create a sense of claustrophobia that only Jesus can break.

appendices.notities: The preacher uses 'management' as a negative source domain for religious legalism.
